item.title: How to setup Node.js and Npm behind a corporate web proxy
item.author: jason@jjasonclark.com (Jason Clark)
item.description: For those who, like me, are behind a corporate web proxy, setting up Node.js and using npm can be a real pain. I thought that the web proxy settings would be like the rest of the unix world and require me to set the HTTP_PROXY and HTTPS_PROXY environment variables. Although I just cloned the Node repository from Github so they are already setup. What gives?
